src/playbook/matcher.py.description: Added _score_structured_match function (line 785+) that requires BOTH teams to match for 2-team sports. Also added _build_team_alias_lookup, _extract_teams_from_text, and _dates_within_proximity helper functions.

src/playbook/parsers/structured_filename.description: New module containing StructuredName dataclass for parsed filename components (raw, date, teams, sport, season_type, year)
